name: The Cube Game (toyfish, Juliestrator, passivestar)
description:
The Cube Game

The game is a casual super-minimalistic experimental puzzle that will test your ability to think outside of the box. We are super hyped to hear your opinion about it! Can you complete all of the 20 levels?

Chat with us on discord:

https://discord.gg/HF22HE8QVG
